Class DrinkManager

java.lang.Object
Metthy.Controller.DrinkController
public class DrinkManager extends Object
Centralized manager for handling drink configurations, pricing, and ingredient calculations.

This class is responsible for:

  • Initializing a standard menu of espresso-based drinks
  • Accepting and storing ingredient prices (coffee beans, milk, water)
  • Calculating ingredient quantities based on drink type and size
  • Converting between fluid ounces and grams using brew ratios
  • Displaying ingredient breakdowns for individual drinks

    • getCupSize

      private double getCupSize(String size)
      Calculates the total fluid ounces corresponding to the size of a drink.
      Parameters:
      size - the drink size (e.g., "Small", "Medium", "Large")
      Returns:
      the size of the cup in fluid ounces, or 0 if the size is invalid

    • getIngredients

      private double[] getIngredients(String coffeeType, String coffeeSize)
      Calculates the amount of each ingredient required to prepare a drink.
      Parameters:
      coffeeType - the type of coffee
      coffeeSize - the size of the drink
      Returns:
      a double array containing the required ingredients [coffeeGrams, milkOz, totalWaterOz]

    • getCoffeeGrams

      private double getCoffeeGrams(String coffeeType, String size)
      Returns the amount of coffee beans (in grams) required for the given drink.
      Parameters:
      coffeeType - the type of coffee (e.g., "Latte", "Cappuccino", "Americano")
      size - the drink size (e.g., "Small", "Medium", "Large")
      Returns:
      the amount of coffee beans required, in grams

    • getMilkOz

      private double getMilkOz(String coffeeType, String size)
      Returns the amount of milk (in fluid ounces) required for the given drink.
      Parameters:
      coffeeType - the type of coffee (e.g., "Latte", "Cappuccino", "Americano")
      size - the drink size (e.g., "Small", "Medium", "Large")
      Returns:
      the amount of milk required, in fluid ounces

    • getWaterOz

      private double getWaterOz(String coffeeType, String size)
      Returns the total amount of water (in fluid ounces) required for the given drink.
      Parameters:
      coffeeType - the type of coffee (e.g., "Latte", "Cappuccino", "Americano")
      size - the drink size (e.g., "Small", "Medium", "Large")
      Returns:
      the total amount of water required, in fluid ounces

    • showIngredients

      private void showIngredients(String coffeeType, String coffeeSize)
      Displays the required ingredient amounts for a given coffee type and size.
      Parameters:
      coffeeType - the type of coffee (e.g., "Latte", "Cappuccino", "Americano")
      coffeeSize - the size of the drink (e.g., "Small", "Medium", "Large")

    • selectDrinkType

      private String selectDrinkType()
      Prompts the user to select a coffee drink type.
      Returns:
      The selected coffee drink type as a String ("Americano", "Latte", or "Cappuccino"), or null if the user cancels.

    • selectDrinkSize

      private String selectDrinkSize()
      Prompts the user to select a coffee drink size.
      Returns:
      The selected coffee size as a String ("Small", "Medium", or "Large"), or null if the user cancels.

    • hasSufficientIngredients

      private boolean hasSufficientIngredients(StorageBin beanBin, StorageBin milkBin, StorageBin waterBin, StorageBin cupBin, double[] ingredients)
      Checks whether the truck has enough ingredients to prepare the desired drink.
      Parameters:
      beanBin - The storage bin for coffee beans.
      milkBin - The storage bin for milk.
      waterBin - The storage bin for water.
      cupBin - The storage bin for the correct cup size.
      ingredients - An array containing required amounts: [beans (g), milk (oz), water (oz)].
      Returns:
      true if all ingredients and one cup are available, false otherwise.

    • useIngredients

      private void useIngredients(StorageBin beanBin, double espressoGrams, StorageBin milkBin, double milkOz, StorageBin waterBin, double waterOz, StorageBin cupBin)
      Deducts the required quantities of ingredients from the corresponding storage bins during drink preparation.
      Parameters:
      beanBin - the storage bin holding coffee beans
      espressoGrams - the amount of coffee beans used in grams
      milkBin - the storage bin holding milk
      milkOz - the amount of milk used in fluid ounces
      waterBin - the storage bin holding water
      waterOz - the amount of water used in fluid ounces
      cupBin - the storage bin holding cups for the selected drink size

      Displays the drinks menu

      private Drink getDrink(String type, String size)
      Searches the drink menu for a drink that matches the specified type and size.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of coffee drink (e.g., "Latte", "Cappuccino")
      size - the size of the drink (e.g., "Small", "Medium", "Large")
      Returns:
      the matching Drink object, or null if not found
